items.sentence: Tom has been waiting all his life for a woman like Mary.
Tom has been waiting for Mary for more than three hours.
Tom has lost a lot of blood and the doctors are worried.
Tom had many opportunities to meet Mary over the summer.
Tom studies French every morning before he goes to work.
Tom suspects that Mary is the one who stole his bicycle.
I\'m convinced Tom had nothing to do with what happened.
I\'m not sure my parents would want me to give you that.
Why don\'t you come over to my house for dinner tonight?
It was not until a few days later that the news arrived.
Tom quit his job and decided to travel around the world.
Tom started to answer the question, but was interrupted.
Tom was disappointed that he couldn\'t get into Harvard.
I think that was one of the best movies I\'ve ever seen.
Tom ate some of my rice while I was away from the table.
Tom broke one of the rules and was kicked out of school.
Tom broke up with Mary and started going out with Alice.
Tom burned all the pictures he had of his ex-girlfriend.
I started studying French when I was in the third grade.
I don\'t know why Tom didn\'t do what I asked him to do.
